name: Rogue: monster sweeper
description:
Rogue: monster sweeper is a casual rogue-like RPG with an element of minesweeper added.

Features:

  • Takes 2 - 7 minutes for each run.
  • Even though you are defeated in a combat, the character you selected for the run will be stronger so that the next run will be slightly easier (Rogue-lite element).
  • You will get in-game currency based on the performance of your run. Use the resource to purchase permanent upgrades at in-game store.

The game is also available at google play store.

The game is still under a development stage but the main part of the game is mostly done. More characters, items, stages, game modes and etc., are planned to be added.

Follow me on twitter and Instagram for updates and new games.
